text:
- Authority Brands is a
home services franchiser.
We have been growing quite rapidly

through acquisitions
and just organic growth.
My challenge was to find a way

to consolidate that
environment and simplify it.
So, moving to AWS was the clearest path
to simplifying the infrastructure

and having a stable
platform to operate in.
By moving to AWS, that allowed us

to minimize our surface
of attack, if you will,
with respect to security.
So, we use Control Tower, guardrails,

all the various security
infrastructure that AWS gives us

to put everything we have in
a secure box, essentially,

and that was extremely helpful
with our security posture,

and made sure my team
is not running around
trying to remediate multiple applications.
Everything is in the same place,
so we can actually have better efficiency,
even in reacting and being responsive.
With regard to small businesses,
they have a repeatable process,
and that's where AWS came in
with educating us in terms of,

how are we going to be
able to move to the cloud,

and walking us through
those steps-by-steps,

and showing us where we
would have challenges,
and then, would step in and say,

"This is what we've seen
with our other customers."
Moving to AWS has allowed us
to scale at a reasonable price point.
Versus adding more people,
it's a lot cheaper to automate things

and, you know, look as
infrastructure as code

to implement some of the
things we normally do.
So, we are running more efficiently
and we haven't had to add additional staff
as a result of expansions.
